title: Dao: Journey to the Top of the Universe - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Xuanhuan
tags: Alchemy   Cultivation   Early Romance   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Lucky Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Romantic Subplot   Slow Romance
author: Shi Tang Bao Zi   食堂包子
description: The journey of Shiao Chen's cultivation was full of deathly dangers, and he almost died several times. Every step was accompanied with great blood-shed, but every thing he did was out of his clean conscience. One day he would posses the capabilities to come and go freely among the universe and rule every force in the world. He would tower over all his peers and rise to the top.>
